abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Brian Crowe on
            behalf of Mrs. Piercy at the Board meeting of August 26,
            1997 concerning the Country Assistance Strategy, the Second
            Structural Adjustment and Technical Assistance Credits for Armenia.
